breakdowns.description: Show the error if any of the input is having the error during addition.
conditions: All error messages should be generic and user-friendly.
Internal error details must not be exposed to users.
Detailed errors should be logged securely for debugging.

breakdowns.description: Perform subtraction and handle errors as specified.
conditions: All error messages should be generic and user-friendly.
Internal error details must not be exposed to users.
Detailed errors should be logged securely for debugging.
